scripts.bootstrap: pnpm i && pnpm run build:only && pnpm run link
scripts.lint: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 eslint packages example e2e --ext .js,.ts --cache
scripts.lint:fix: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 eslint packages example e2e --ext .js,.ts --cache --fix
scripts.example:midway:vue: cd example/midway-vue-ssr && ll node_modules && npm start
scripts.example:midway:react: cd example/midway-react-ssr && ll node_modules && npm start
scripts.example:midway:vue3: cd example/midway-vue3-ssr && ll node_modules && npm start
scripts.example:midway:vue3:vite: cd example/midway-vue3-ssr && ll node_modules && npx ssr start --vite
scripts.example:midway:react:vite: cd example/midway-react-ssr && ll node_modules && npx ssr start --vite
scripts.example:nestjs:react:prod: cd example/nestjs-react-ssr && ll node_modules && npm run prod
scripts.example:nestjs:vue3:prod: cd example/nestjs-vue3-ssr && ll node_modules && npm run prod
scripts.example:nestjs:vue:prod: cd example/nestjs-vue-ssr && ll node_modules && npm run prod
scripts.example:nestjs:react:prod:vite: cd example/nestjs-react-ssr && ll node_modules && npm run prod:vite
scripts.example:nestjs:vue3:prod:vite: cd example/nestjs-vue3-ssr && ll node_modules && npm run prod:vite
scripts.example:nestjs:react: cd example/nestjs-react-ssr && ll node_modules && npm start
scripts.example:nestjs:vue: cd example/nestjs-vue-ssr && ll node_modules && npm start
scripts.example:nestjs:vue3: cd example/nestjs-vue3-ssr && ll node_modules && npm start
scripts.example:midway:react:dynamic:router: cd example/react-dynamic-router-test && ll node_modules && npm start
